Summary: lights in position of a triangle, 2 red blinking lights and one like a diamond when the sun glares upon it
divs: Sighting Detailsi was laying behind a church about to fall a sleep and suddenly i see what i thought was a satalite passs by in the wsky but very low i remember thingking that there was a oval shape to its form but was not sure. the lights flashed whith no certain pattern randomly.i would say about 3 to 5 minutes the same object passed by . i realized it was not a satalite so i watched to see if i would see it again and it crossed the sky once more at the same height in the dark sky of the night i tried to see any shape but couldnt be sure, I recall and oval of dark matter.also with each pass there was a low hum or vibration type sound. july 1 . now on the second i seen the same object but much higher up but the flashing of the 2 red lights and one white (like a diamond)then what i thought was a plane appeared to cross my eye sight it had 3 or 4 white flashing lights there was a hum and a vibration sound sort of with a srech then it forward in too what appeard to be a big storm cloud then a sound like (can not describe with words)it just vanished
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 2nd 2005
